name: Casino Rush
description:
Submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2022

Credits to:

Minyoung Heo

Paul Jung

Esther Jung

Karen Jung

This game is a basic topdown shooter/action that attempts to implement the theme: Roll of the Dice.  The game is simple: just attack enemies as they run towards you. The "Dice" mechanic comes from the fact that your weapon and elemental buff are randomly chosen every 10 seconds. During those 10 seconds, you have to use what the "dice roll" gives you.

Controls:

Use WASD to move and mouse LEFT CLICK to attack.
